name: Microbes (Two Faces Studio)
description:
Play on browser with Liluo : https://liluo.io/instant-builds/a67ea402-0a0c-4106-91d0-8b5f4832818a

In one sentence, Microbes is a satisfying game with a deck building aspect !

As a virus, you will have to destroy antibodies to unlock new viruses (they will join you during the game !) and go further more into the blood to reach new stages.

A good deck building will be essential to succeed but be careful : if you lose a game, all of your team will lose a life and you may have to reconstruct these viruses if they don't have life points anymore !!

Yet, at this step of development, the difficulty is lowered to let you discover quickly some of the mechanics :-)

You will find all the credits in "options" on the main menu. Everything was made during the game jam except the audio and the public extensions of GDevelop of course :-)

Hope you will have fun playing this game !
